.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_2_explain_plot_6_data_dependent_explain.py:


Data Dependent Explanation 
=====================================

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 9-10

Experiment initialization and data preparation

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 10-18

.. code-block:: default

    from piml import Experiment
    from piml.models import XGB2Classifier

    exp = Experiment()
    exp.data_loader(data="SimuCredit", silent=True)
    exp.data_summary(feature_exclude=["Gender", "Race"], silent=True)
    exp.data_prepare(target="Approved", task_type="classification", silent=True)








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 19-20

Train Model

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 20-22

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_train(model=XGB2Classifier(n_estimators=100), name="XGB2")








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 23-24

PFI with training data (by default)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 24-26

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_explain(model="XGB2", show="pfi", figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_6_data_dependent_explain_001.png
   :alt: Permutation Feature Importance
   :srcset: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_6_data_dependent_explain_001.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 27-28

PFI with testing data

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 28-30

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_explain(model="XGB2", show="pfi", use_test=True, figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_6_data_dependent_explain_002.png
   :alt: Permutation Feature Importance
   :srcset: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_6_data_dependent_explain_002.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 31-32

H-statistics with training data (use training data by default)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 32-35

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_explain(model="XGB2", show="hstats", 
                      grid_size=5, figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_6_data_dependent_explain_003.png
   :alt: Interaction Importance (H-Statistic)
   :srcset: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_6_data_dependent_explain_003.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 36-37

H-statistics with testing data

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 37-40

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_explain(model="XGB2", show="hstats", use_test=True, 
                      grid_size=5, figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_6_data_dependent_explain_004.png
   :alt: Interaction Importance (H-Statistic)
   :srcset: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_6_data_dependent_explain_004.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 41-42

PDP with training data (use training data by default)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 42-45

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_explain(model="XGB2", show="pdp", uni_feature="Balance",
                      grid_size=50, figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_6_data_dependent_explain_005.png

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 73-75

.. code-block:: default
